dmca.title: Developer Wants to Evict Independent Forums from grantpark.net
dmca.body:
Dear [private]: 

This firm represents Gittleman Management Corporation, which manages the Grant Park Homes development for the Grant Park Association ("GPA"). GPA has asked me to review certain marketing practices regarding your operation of the www.grantpark.net website and solicitation of GPA members.

GPA owns all rights in and to Grant Park  service mark, including a Minnesota service mark registration, which gives GPA the exclusive rights to use the Grant Part service mark within Minnesota for services associated with operation of residential condominium complex.

My client and GPA believe that your unauthorized use of the grantpark.net domain name and Grant Park service mark featured on this web site infringe GPA
